name: The Tatterdemalion Temple
description:
This was submitted to the 2023 Dungeon Crawl Jam.

https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2023

The theme is duality, so you have only two choices where you interact with monsters, or make decisions. 

Controls

Escape: Bring up a controls and statistics screen in-game.

W: Forward

S: Backward

A: Left

D: Right

Q: Rotate left

E: Rotate right

Space: Wait a turn

1: Top or Left choice

2: Bottom or Right choice

Sorry, windows didn't build. I'll see if i can resolve the issue and upload a windows build later.
